Title: GamerShots.com Screenshot Capture
Description: Windows application written in C# Asp.NET.  Captures the default screen with "Print Screen" key or with user input.  Navigates with a WebBrowser control to Login and Upload pages from gamershots.com.  Once logged in the user can upload the fresh screenshot jpg to their account.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Windows application written in C# Asp.NET. Captures the default screen with "Print Screen" key or with user input. Navigates with a WebBrowser control to Login and Upload pages from gamershots.com. Once logged in the user can upload the fresh screenshot jpg to their account.
